creator: Drury Outdoors
descriptionHtml:
Deer are complex animals that are constantly reacting to their environments. DeerCast has taken those factors and integrated them with location-specific, real-time weather data to deliver the most reliable deer movement prediction ever.

The result? More than half a million hunters installed DeerCast last season alone to get ahead of their game.

“I’ve never shot a buck this early in the season, but DeerCast said “Great” and definitely made this hunt a success!” - Jason H.

“We live 45 minutes from our property and have a busy family so we watch DeerCast for those small windows when we can get to the woods. DeerCast called it “Great” and my son took a 178” Kansas monster!” – Brian S.

DeerCast is the culmination of Mark and Terry Drury’s 70 combined years of deer hunting knowledge wrapped up into the essential tool for deer hunters. With a tuned-up algorithm based on real-world usage data and forecasts out to 10 days, DeerCast is more accurate than ever!

DeerCast TRACK
The hunt isn’t over once you’ve made the shot. With Track, select your point of impact on an anatomical deer model and see inside the shot. The DeerCast Track tool will select shots that most closely match yours from our extensive database and then deliver videos that show the affected body systems. You’ll also get expert advice from seasoned trackers on what you likely hit, how long to wait, and what to look for in the tracking process.

DeerCast CUSTOM
Customize our algorithm to your hunting areas DeerCast Custom. Custom allows you to dial in the optimism or pessimism of your DeerCast, fine-tuning a unique deer movement forecast for each of your saved locations.

DESKTOP
Access all the resources and tools of your DeerCast account on a laptop, tablet, or desktop computer by simply logging in to DeerCast.com!

DODTV
Every online video and series we produce is cataloged and kept up to date in the DODTV section of DeerCast. Get recipe ideas from Tay’s “Killing It In The Kitchen.” Watch guest interviews on the “100% Wild Podcast” and a whole lot more! Our entire DODTV channel is waiting for you in DeerCast!

ARTICLES
Boost your hunting knowledge and skillset with daily articles from our team of passionate outdoor writers. From land management, wild game prep, whitetail tactics, and everything in between, hunting is a continuing education and the DeerCast classroom is always in session.

DeerCast LIBRARY
Do you miss the good old days of hunting videos? Binge watch over 115 of our VHS/DVD titles reaching all the way back to 1989. There are over 210 HOURS of high quality, classic hunting footage right at your fingertips.

DeerCast NOW
Witness our team members’ raw footage from the field, as the hunts happen during the season, exclusively within the DeerCast NOW video series.

FEEDBACK
We want to know about your experience with DeerCast! Shoot us an email at support@DeerCast.com.

descriptionShort: Algorithm-driven deer movement forecasts for your precise location.
title: DeerCast: Deer Hunting Decoded

creator: Drury Outdoors
descriptionHtml:
"This is my first year using DeerCast and it’s a game changer! Normally my seasons are hit or miss, but this year, using DeerCast, I knocked down a great Michigan bruiser. I highly recommend DeerCast be added to every hunting arsenal. It flat out works!"
- Mike Francues

More than just another hunting app, DeerCast is a powerful platform of advanced tools with one objective: to make you a better hunter. DeerCast was built to get you ahead of your game.

20 yards away standing broadside, the buck of your dreams and countless trail cam pics stands relaxed with his head down feeding. Fading sunlight glows golden on his thick tines as your pulse races and you prepare for the shot. You finally caught up to your target buck.

The moment is magic. The timing is DeerCast. Here’s what’s under the hood:

DeerCast Forecast
Don’t waste time burning out a stand. Powered by over 70 years of in-field, real-world experience from expert whitetail hunters Mark and Terry Drury of Drury Outdoors, DeerCast decodes deer movement. Using your local weather data and a 13-factor, proprietary algorithm that includes barometric pressure, the DeerCast Forecast shows you, out to ten days, down to the hour, the likelihood of deer movement in whatever area you select.

Each customized forecast generates a unique set of videos explaining what factors are at play in your scenario, helping you get inside the brain of a whitetail deer.

DeerCast Track
Every hunter knows it’s not over until you’ve laid hands on your buck, which is why DeerCast is equipped with Track. See inside your shot with a revolutionary 2D anatomical deer model that allows you to toggle the exterior of the deer on or off, showing the skeleton and organ systems.

Select your point of impact on the 2D deer and DeerCast Track searches an extensive database of hit videos, delivering only those that most closely match your shot. Each video includes interviews from seasoned tracking pros with over 5,000 tracking jobs under their collective belts. They’ll give their opinions on what you likely hit, if the shot was lethal, how long to wait before tracking, what to look for on the bloodtrail, and more. Recover your deer with DeerCast Track.

DeerCast Daily
Every morning DeerCast Daily greets you with a brand-new article from one of our accomplished outdoor writers to keep you informed and growing as hunter. With over 600 articles to browse and more coming every day, it’s like having a hunting magazine subscription for free!

DODTV
What if you could enjoy the entire 30-year catalog of Drury Outdoors videos, on-demand? With DeerCast, you can! Over 115 titles have been digitally remastered and organized in the DODTV section of DeerCast. Plus, catch all of our online videos too. You’ll never be bored in the stand again!

Fan Shares
DeerCast brings back the classic bragging board at the check-in station with the Fan Share Feed! Upload your hero pics and stories for DeerCasters everywhere to enjoy! Like and comment on the successes of others too!

DeerCast Custom
No matter how close, no two properties hunt exactly the same. Custom gives you the power to take the DeerCast algorithm and tweak it for each of your specific hunting areas.

DeerCast NOW
See the shot minutes after our team members recover their deer with DeerCast NOW! Cold front coming? Be ready for it as our team offers real-time info on what tactics are taking deer and plan your own hunts accordingly!

FEEDBACK
We want to know about your experience with DeerCast! Shoot us an email at support@DeerCast.com.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The best just got better! DeerCast now gives you social media features to keep the conversation going! Update and unlock these new features:

• Tagging/Mentions in comments and replies
• Replying to Comments
• Liking Comments
• Edit and delete comments and replies
• Hide and report comments and replies
• Edit and delete posts
• Hide and report posts
• Additional Notification Screen on the setting page to see likes, replies, and mentions
• Improved DODTV comment screen layout

Don’t waste time burning out a stand. Powered by over 70 years of in-field, real-world experience from expert whitetail hunters Mark and Terry Drury of Drury Outdoors, DeerCast decodes deer movement. Using your local weather data and a 13-factor, proprietary algorithm that includes barometric pressure, the DeerCast Forecast shows you, out to ten days, down to the hour, the likelihood of deer movement in whatever area you select.

Each customized forecast generates a unique set of videos explaining what factors are at play in your scenario, helping you get inside the brain of a whitetail deer.

DeerCast Track
Every hunter knows it’s not over until you’ve laid hands on your buck, which is why DeerCast is equipped with Track. See inside your shot with a revolutionary 2D anatomical deer model that allows you to toggle the exterior of the deer on or off, showing the skeleton and organ systems.

Select your point of impact on the 2D deer and DeerCast Track searches an extensive database of hit videos, delivering only those that most closely match your shot. Each video includes interviews from seasoned tracking pros with over 5,000 tracking jobs under their collective belts. They’ll give their opinions on what you likely hit, if the shot was lethal, how long to wait before tracking, what to look for on the bloodtrail, and more. Recover your deer with DeerCast Track.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Just in time for bow season, DeerCast is as ready as you are with some great new features at your fingertips!

New home screen that integrates your DeerCast Forecast with the main feed!

descriptionShort: The most advanced deer hunting app ever!
title: DeerCast: Deer Hunting Decoded

creator: Drury Outdoors
descriptionHtml:
"This is my first year using DeerCast and it’s a game changer! Normally my seasons are hit or miss, but this year, using DeerCast, I knocked down a great Michigan bruiser. I highly recommend DeerCast be added to every hunting arsenal. It flat out works!"
- Mike Francues

More than just another hunting app, DeerCast is a powerful platform of advanced tools with one objective: to make you a better hunter. DeerCast was built to get you ahead of your game.

20 yards away standing broadside, the buck of your dreams and countless trail cam pics stands relaxed with his head down feeding. Fading sunlight glows golden on his thick tines as your pulse races and you prepare for the shot. You finally caught up to your target buck.

The moment is magic. The timing is DeerCast. Here’s what’s under the hood:

DeerCast Forecast
Don’t waste time burning out a stand. Powered by over 70 years of in-field, real-world experience from expert whitetail hunters Mark and Terry Drury of Drury Outdoors, DeerCast decodes deer movement. Using your local weather data and a 13-factor, proprietary algorithm that includes barometric pressure, the DeerCast Forecast shows you, out to ten days, down to the hour, the likelihood of deer movement in whatever area you select.

Each customized forecast generates a unique set of videos explaining what factors are at play in your scenario, helping you get inside the brain of a whitetail deer.

DeerCast Track
Every hunter knows it’s not over until you’ve laid hands on your buck, which is why DeerCast is equipped with Track. See inside your shot with a revolutionary 2D anatomical deer model that allows you to toggle the exterior of the deer on or off, showing the skeleton and organ systems.

Select your point of impact on the 2D deer and DeerCast Track searches an extensive database of hit videos, delivering only those that most closely match your shot. Each video includes interviews from seasoned tracking pros with over 5,000 tracking jobs under their collective belts. They’ll give their opinions on what you likely hit, if the shot was lethal, how long to wait before tracking, what to look for on the bloodtrail, and more. Recover your deer with DeerCast Track.

DeerCast Daily
Every morning DeerCast Daily greets you with a brand-new article from one of our accomplished outdoor writers to keep you informed and growing as hunter. With over 600 articles to browse and more coming every day, it’s like having a hunting magazine subscription for free!

DODTV
What if you could enjoy the entire 30-year catalog of Drury Outdoors videos, on-demand? With DeerCast, you can! Over 115 titles have been digitally remastered and organized in the DODTV section of DeerCast. Plus, catch all of our online videos too. You’ll never be bored in the stand again!

Fan Shares
DeerCast brings back the classic bragging board at the check-in station with the Fan Share Feed! Upload your hero pics and stories for DeerCasters everywhere to enjoy! Like and comment on the successes of others too!

DeerCast Custom
No matter how close, no two properties hunt exactly the same. Custom gives you the power to take the DeerCast algorithm and tweak it for each of your specific hunting areas.

DeerCast NOW
See the shot minutes after our team members recover their deer with DeerCast NOW! Cold front coming? Be ready for it as our team offers real-time info on what tactics are taking deer and plan your own hunts accordingly!

FEEDBACK

descriptionShort: The most advanced deer hunting app ever!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Maintenance and bug fixes.

title: DeerCast: Deer Hunting Decoded

creator: Drury Outdoors
descriptionHtml:
DeerCast FORECAST
At the heart of DeerCast is over 90 years of Mark and Terry Drury’s whitetail hunting expertise. That knowledge powers an hour-by-hour, real-time, algorithm-driven deer movement forecast out to 14 days for your precise location.

DeerCast MAP
Knowing when a deer is likely to be up and on its feet is crucial for a successful hunt. But you also have to know the land and how to deploy your resources, like stands and trail cameras relative to deer signs. Create a killer ground game with a map purpose-built for whitetail hunting. Here are just some of the advanced tools you get with DeerCast MAP:

• Rain Stations - Prep your food plots and time your hunts with historic and upcoming rainfall data.

• Wind Check - Play the wind and understand how it behaves with Wind Check. This tool allows you to see the current and future winds on your map, paired with crucial information for how to hunt that particular wind speed.

• Food Plot / Area Measurement - Measure acreage, help estimate seed and chemicals needed, and record what you planted.

• Distance - Supercharge your Maps with a built-in rangefinder that measures from yards to miles!

• Live Doppler Radar - Get real-time and forecasted radar animated into your maps

• Path Tracking - Create a GPS track to reference later.

• Parcel Data - Access new ground and know who owns the land around you with parcel data

• Waypoints - Choose from a concise library of purpose-built waypoints that hunters need.

DeerCast TRACK
Get expert advice from seasoned trackers on what vitals you may have hit, how long to wait, and what to look for in the tracking process. Pick your point of impact on an anatomical deer model and the proprietary DeerCast Track algorithm will select hits that most closely match yours from our extensive database and then deliver videos that show the affected body systems. Hands down, Track is the most advanced deer recovery tool around.

DeerCast COMMUNITY
Every day, the DeerCast COMMUNITY updates with stories of success from the field, news articles, tips, incredible hunt videos and more! Interact with Drury Outdoor team members and other DeerCasters in a fun, positive community. Scroll on through and enjoy:

• DeerCast Dailies - Boost your outdoor knowledge with a constantly-updating library of articles from our team of experienced outdoor writers!

• FAN SHARES - Upload and share your successes in the Fan Share feed!

• Journals - Learn from DOD team members & see their kill shots as they happen directly from the field!

With four different tiers to choose from, you decide which version best suits the way you hunt. Get ahead of your game with DeerCast!

MANAGE SUBSCRIPTION
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your AppStore account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and identify the cost of the renewal.
- Payment will be charged to your AppStore Account at confirmation of purchase.
- Visit the following URL for full terms of use: https://deercast.com/public/terms-of-service
- Turn off auto-renewal via the main Settings app: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039

But you also have to know the land and how to deploy your resources, like stands and trail cameras relative to deer signs. Create a killer ground game with a map purpose-built for whitetail hunting. Here are just some of the advanced tools you get with DeerCast MAP:

• Rain Stations - Prep your food plots and time your hunts with historic and upcoming rainfall data.

• Wind Check - Play the wind and understand how it behaves with Wind Check. This tool allows you to see the current and future winds on your map, paired with crucial information for how to hunt that particular wind speed.

• Food Plot / Area Measurement - Measure acreage, help estimate seed and chemicals needed, and record what you planted.

• Distance - Supercharge your Maps with a built-in rangefinder that measures from yards to miles!

• Live Doppler Radar - Get real-time and forecasted radar animated into your maps

• Path Tracking - Create a GPS track to reference later.

• Parcel Data - Access new ground and know who owns the land around you with parcel data

• Waypoints - Choose from a concise library of purpose-built waypoints that hunters need.

DeerCast TRACK
Get expert advice from seasoned trackers on what vitals you may have hit, how long to wait, and what to look for in the tracking process. Pick your point of impact on an anatomical deer model and the proprietary DeerCast Track algorithm will select hits that most closely match yours from our extensive database and then deliver videos that show the affected body systems. Hands down, Track is the most advanced deer recovery tool around.

DeerCast COMMUNITY
Every day, the DeerCast COMMUNITY updates with stories of success from the field, news articles, tips, incredible hunt videos and more! Interact with Drury Outdoor team members and other DeerCasters in a fun, positive community. Scroll on through and enjoy:

• DeerCast Dailies - Boost your outdoor knowledge with a constantly-updating library of articles from our team of experienced outdoor writers!

• FAN SHARES - Upload and share your successes in the Fan Share feed!

• Journals - Learn from DOD team members & see their kill shots as they happen directly from the field!

With four different tiers to choose from, you decide which version best suits the way you hunt. Get ahead of your game with DeerCast!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
DeerCast is now supercharged with maps! Create food plots, place virtual rain gauges, check your wind, measure distances, view live Doppler radar, and more! Enjoy the performance enhancements, too and get ahead of your game!

3.0.6
* Added mowing as a path tracking item
* Improved offline map selector layout and visibility
* Added the ability to include additional optional information on your profile
* Additional fixes and performance updates.

descriptionShort: Forecast movement. Map. Track.
title: DeerCast-Prep, Predict, Pursue

creator: Drury Outdoors
descriptionHtml:
DeerCast predicts deer movement. Save time and money by hunting when conditions are right!

Become a better deer hunter using DeerCast to collect and deliver all the information and tools you need.

Forecast
Designed by renowned whitetail experts Mark and Terry Drury, down to the hour, DeerCast pulls weather and moon data for your locations and delivers a custom, 14-day deer-movement prediction, just for you.

Maps
Plan your hunts with maps and tools built specifically for the whitetail hunter!

Drop waypoints for stands, trail cams, scrapes, or anything you want and share with your hunting buddies.

Use Wind Check to see where your scent is going. Pick the right stand and the right path into it.

Prep your food plots and time your hunts with historic and upcoming rainfall data using Rain Stations.

Live Doppler Radar gives you real-time and forecasted radar animated onto your maps.

From a few yards to a few miles, the Distance tool will measure anything you need!

Track
Whether you’re bowhunting or using other methods, select your hit on an anatomical whitetail model then get expert advice to track and recover your deer!

Community
Boost your outdoor knowledge with thousands of hunting articles! Upload and share your successes and learn from the Drury Outdoors team as you watch their hunts happen!

MANAGE SUBSCRIPTION
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your iTunes account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and identify the cost of the renewal.
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of Purchase.
- Visit the following URL for full terms of use: https://deercast.com/public/terms-of-service
- Turn off auto-renewal via the main Settings app: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039

We want to know about your experience with DeerCast! Shoot us an email at support@DeerCast.com.

title: DeerCast-Prep, Predict, Pursue

creator: Drury Outdoors
descriptionHtml:
DeerCast predicts deer movement. Save time and money by hunting when conditions are right!

Become a better deer hunter using DeerCast to collect and deliver all the information and tools you need.

Forecast
Designed by renowned whitetail experts Mark and Terry Drury, down to the hour, DeerCast pulls weather and moon data for your locations and delivers a custom, 14-day deer-movement prediction, just for you.

Maps
Plan your hunts with maps and tools built specifically for the whitetail hunter!

Drop waypoints for stands, trail cams, scrapes, or anything you want and share with your hunting buddies.

Use Wind Check to see where your scent is going. Pick the right stand and the right path into it.

Prep your food plots and time your hunts with historic and upcoming rainfall data using Rain Stations.

Live Doppler Radar gives you real-time and forecasted radar animated onto your maps.

From a few yards to a few miles, the Distance tool will measure anything you need!

Track
Whether you’re bowhunting or using other methods, select your hit on an anatomical whitetail model then get expert advice to track and recover your deer!

Community
Boost your outdoor knowledge with thousands of hunting articles! Upload and share your successes and learn from the Drury Outdoors team as you watch their hunts happen!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We’re gearing up DeerCast for deer season with new features and enhancements like:
improvements for Rain Station date selection
share all map assets with other DeerCast users (Rain Stations, distances, Path Tracks, waypoints, Areas/Food Plots)
switch between map types (satellite, topo, contour) while actively recording a Path Track
more under-the-hood updates for increased app performance and reliability

title: DeerCast-Prep, Predict, Pursue

creator: Drury Media - DeerCast
descriptionHtml:
DeerCast is the most advanced whitetail hunting app, built for deer hunters, by deer hunters.

DeerCast predicts whitetail movement down to the hour based on weather variables in your area.

Whitetail deer behavior is driven by their environment. Become a better whitetail hunter with the DeerCast hunting app! Get data-driven deer movement predictions, advanced weather forecasts, and mapping features all specifically formulated with the whitetail deer hunter in mind. DeerCast delivers all the information you need to get your buck!

Forecast
Designed by renowned whitetail experts Mark and Terry Drury of Drury Outdoors, DeerCast pulls weather and moon data for your locations and delivers a custom, deer-movement prediction, just for you.

Maps
Plan your whitetail hunts with multiple GPS maps and tools built specifically for the whitetail hunter!

Waypoints
Wind Check
Food Plots
Live Doppler Radar
Virtual Rain Gauges

Track
Select your hit on an anatomical whitetail model then get expert advice to track and recover your deer!

Community
Get thousands of hunting articles and share your successes from the field. Learn from the Drury Outdoors team and watch their hunts as they happen!


MANAGE SUBSCRIPTION
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and identify the cost of the renewal.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Here's an early Christmas present for you: We've integrated Stealth and Muddy cell cams into your DeerCast mapping experience! Go to the Plus hex on the map, select Command Pro Trail Cams, then connect your Command Pro account and select the cameras you want displayed on your maps! After you've connected your Command Pro account, just turn on the Command layer from the Layers hex to see them whenever you want. It's easy and gives you a brand new way to gather and review intel on your herd.
